100% remote (US client). Freelance/Contract.
Email: recruiting@wynwood-tech.com We are currently looking for multiple Tag Implementation Leads for one of the leading tech companies in the US. The position is 100% remote and long-term.

QUICK FACTS:
- Permament position
- Start: ASAP or in the next few weeks
- 100% remote
- Duration: long-term 12+ months
- Capacity: full-time, part-time also possible
- Language: English
- Eastern Standard Time

REQUIREMENTS:
- Understanding of tag management systems and their role in digital analytics
- Experience with marketing data analytics using tools such as Google Analytics and Adobe Analytics
- Familiarity with Google Tag Manager for implementing and managing tracking tags
- Ability to work with GA debugging and developer tools for troubleshooting and validation
- Awareness of tracking strategy, data collection, and measurement best practices
